Segment.name: G36
Segment.comment: To provide price list references and descriptions

Field.name: PriceListNumber
Field.comment: Identification number assigned by a vendor to a price list

Field.name: PriceListIssueNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned to revised or new issues of a price list

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: PriceConditionAppliesCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether price conditions apply to a price change
